bioconda.name: bioconductor-gsva
bioconda.summary: Gene Set Variation Analysis for Microarray and RNA-Seq Data

biotools.summary: Non-parametric, unsupervised method for estimating variation of gene set enrichment through the samples of an expression data set. It performs a change in coordinate systems, transforming the data from a gene by sample matrix to a gene-set by sample matrix, thereby allowing the evaluation of pathway enrichment for each sample. This new matrix of enrichment scores facilitates applying standard analytical methods like functional enrichment, survival analysis, etc., in a pathway-centric manner.

bioschemas.name: GSVA
bioschemas.summary: Non-parametric, unsupervised method for estimating variation of gene set enrichment through the samples of an expression data set. It performs a change in coordinate systems, transforming the data from a gene by sample matrix to a gene-set by sample matrix, thereby allowing the evaluation of pathway enrichment for each sample. This new matrix of enrichment scores facilitates applying standard analytical methods like functional enrichment, survival analysis, etc., in a pathway-centric manner.
